info.name: Stockshift API
info.description:
Complete API endpoints for Stockshift Backend

## Test Users for E2E Testing

### Development Test User (Auto-generated)
- **Username:** testuser
- **Password:** testpass123
- **Email:** test@stockshift.com
- **Role:** ADMIN
- **Access Token:** dev-access-token-12345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890
- **Refresh Token:** dev-refresh-token-12345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890

### Manual Test Users
- **Admin:** admin / admin123
- **Manager:** manager / manager123
- **Seller:** seller / seller123

### Usage Instructions
1. First run "0. Get Test User Credentials (Dev)" to automatically set up environment variables
2. Use "1A. Login - Test User (E2E)" for automated testing
3. Use "1. Login - Admin/Manager/Seller" for manual testing
4. All login requests automatically update access_token and refresh_token variables

### Environment Variables
The collection uses these environment variables:
- `{{baseUrl}}` - API base URL (default: http://localhost:8080)
- `{{access_token}}` - JWT access token (auto-updated by login requests)
- `{{refresh_token}}` - JWT refresh token (auto-updated by login requests)
- `{{test_username}}` - Test user username (auto-updated by credentials request)
- `{{test_password}}` - Test user password (auto-updated by credentials request)

exec: console.log('Test user credentials updated in environment');
